body: So.. I got the: "Review" tag but I noticed other 20 people got it too, I don't think I'm going to the interview, :c
body_tagged: So.. I got the: "Review" tag but I noticed other 20 people got it too, I don't think I'm going to the interview, :c
title: Nervous

replies.body: Don't worry. I am still under review is well. There is nothing we can do apart from wait. Try to relax.Your life doesn't depend on it.
replies.body_tagged: Don't worry. I am still under review is well. There is nothing we can do apart from wait. Try to relax.Your life doesn't depend on it.

replies.body: what? it doesnt matter about how many others got it, theres no limit of mods that can get accepted
replies.body_tagged: what? it doesnt matter about how many others got it, theres no limit of mods that can get accepted

replies.body: Pelpel, I know but I waited 5 months for this interviews and Panda, thanks for the info, I though there was a limit.
replies.body_tagged: Pelpel, I know but I waited 5 months for this interviews and Panda, thanks for the info, I though there was a limit.

replies.body:
Never feel scared. 
Always be confident in this process, but never cocky. 
If you got the reviewing tag, I suggest you look at your application, edit it to make it just a bit more perfect and ask them to check it out again! 
Good luck ^_^
replies.body_tagged:
Never feel scared. 
Always be confident in this process, but never cocky. 
If you got the reviewing tag, I suggest you look at your application, edit it to make it just a bit more perfect and ask them to check it out again! 
Good luck ^_^

replies.body:
Don't worry Juano!

From what I understand, there will be two batches of interviewees (so far), and the second batch will be announced this Sunday!

No need to worry, just stay calm, there is no limit on how many players will be accepted as Jr. Mods. :)
replies.body_tagged:
Don't worry Juano!

From what I understand, there will be two batches of interviewees (so far), and the second batch will be announced this Sunday!

No need to worry, just stay calm, there is no limit on how many players will be accepted as Jr. Mods. :)

replies.body: As Mooch and Tino have said, there are no limits the amount of moderators are accepted. This, however, shouldn't even be an issue because if you think you can't get it, why even bother applying?
